titles.title: Low and Moderate Income Housing Act of 2014
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage mixed-income housing development.
Low and Moderate Income Housing Act of 2014

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Low and Moderate Income Housing Act of 2014 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the low-income housing tax credit, to provide that a qualified low-income housing project is eligible for the credit if 50% or more of the residential units in such project are both rent-restricted and occupied by individuals whose income is at least 50%, but not more than 120%, of area median gross income.
